patthana8.7:1.1: Naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.7:3.1: Naappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.7:4.1: Nasappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.7:5.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… upanissaye dve …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
